name: Music_4787.wav
caption: This is an Afro-cuban music piece in the style of rumba. It is a live performance. There is a male vocal and a choir singing in a joyful manner. The rhythmic background is composed of Afro-Cuban percussive elements such as the shekere and the conga. The atmosphere is lively and vibrant. This piece could be used as an accompaniment piece for a rumba dance course.
